title: doc: give more tips on proper commit message style
body: In https://go-review.googlesource.com/#/c/21815/1//COMMIT_MSG @bradfitz offers a good tip on how to phrase commit titles. Writing titles and messages is touched on briefly in the [contribution guidelines](https://golang.org/doc/contribute.html#change) but would be nice to mention this and other tips and/or style guidelines.
